title: encrypter
extract: Encrypting is a way of disguising a written message so that most people won't understand it. ... Only someone who knows the code or is an expert in breaking codes — like a cryptographer — will be able to read something encrypted.
extract_html: Encrypting is a way of disguising a written message so that most people won't understand it. ... Only someone who knows the code or is an expert in breaking codes — like a cryptographer — will be able to read something encrypted.
